5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

medium-background

Generic function

Summary

Returns the background for the specified medium.

Signature

medium-background medium => ink

Arguments

medium
An instance of type <medium>.

Values

ink
An instance of type <ink>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the background for medium.

See also

medium-background-setter, page 299

medium-foreground, page 304

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
